actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the provisions which presently exclude from coverage under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program any service performed by an individual in the employ of his or her spouse or by a child in the employ of his or her parent.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Eliminates the provisions which presently exclude from coverage under the Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance Program of the Social Security Act any service performed by an individual in the employ of his or her spouse or by a child in the employ of his or her parent.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the provisions which presently exclude from coverage under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program any service performed by an individual in the employ of his or her spouse or by a child in the employ of his or her parent.
